page.title: 16CLUBS AND SOCIETIES
page.content: There are lots of clubs in Toft and Comberton for all ages.There's the toddlers group which is for children up to three, which meets at the old peoples home in Toft.There is also a play school for children aged 3-4 in Comberton and when you're four or over you go to MERIDIAN (the junior school in Comberton) In Toft and Comberton there are Brownies,Guides,Cubs,Scouts. Brownies and Cubs are for children 7-10 and Guides and Scouts are from 10-15. There are other clubs and lessons to.In Toft you can go to the Womens Institute where you can make and learn about different things. There is a friendship club and a club for over sixties.
